reviews.review_msg: She is smart, kind, caring, and approachable. Class was fun but had more than avg workload. She goes out of her way to help students and is a fair marker. The class content covers many learning traditions that has influenced educational technologies. There is a fun 20% project; you can pick anything to learn and share it in class... easy full marks
Absolutely amazing guy! Very helpful, caring, great sense of humour. One of my favourite profs at SFU for sure.
Great teacher.  He really knows his stuff and delivers it enthusiastically.  Does his best to include everyone and focusses on assignments that are practical and useful for students.
